welcome_message_body: Welcome to Avenel, where small town charm meets big city excitement! Take in the historic sites, quaint shops, and delicious local cuisine. We invite you to experience all that our charming city has to offer.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Linden Airport serves both commercial and private flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Linden Airport caters to private and chartered flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The oldest and smallest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used for domestic flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: The largest and newest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal C
terminals.description: The second largest terminal at Newark Liberty International Airport, primarily used for United Airlines flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport, but may require reconnection in different areas.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is a small, single-story building with a waiting area, check-in counters, and baggage claim.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Caldwell Wright Airport is reserved for private and chartered flights, with a lounge area and separate check-in counters.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the terminal building.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: This terminal is currently not in use.

terminals.name: Terminal 4
terminals.description: This terminal is the main international terminal at JFK.

terminals.name: Terminal 5
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for JetBlue.

terminals.name: Terminal 7
terminals.description: This terminal primarily serves international airlines.

terminals.name: Terminal 8
terminals.description: This terminal serves domestic and international flights for American Airlines.

wifi.note: Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Monmouth Executive Airport serves all commercial and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the terminal building.
